content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Mr. Li. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. What price range are you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
1000-1200 euro

I am interested in the lowest price possible, so I would like to negotiate with you. How can we do that?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I understand, Mr. Li. Negotiations are a common part of the rental process. Let's start by discussing the current market rates for similar apartments in the area. From my research, I believe that the fair market value for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich is around 1100-1200 euros per month. However, I am willing to be flexible and consider your budget. What would you be willing to pay per month for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to pay 1000 euros per month.

I am a student, so I need a reliable and responsible apartment. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I will pay rent on time and take care of the apartment.

I am negotiable. I would like to pay the lowest price possible.

I agree to the price of 1000 euros per month.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Li. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your commitment to being a responsible tenant. I am glad to hear that you are willing to pay 1000 euros per month for the apartment. In that case, I agree to the rental price of 1000 euros per month. I look forward to working with you as your landlord.
name: Heinrich Heine
